title: Smoke-Free Nicotine Alternatives - Trend Hunter

title: Ferrero Travel Market showcases new releases at TFWA World Exhibition, Cannes - Snack Food & Wholesale Bakery
summary: Ferrero Travel Market showcased its focus on gifting, biscuit development, and sustainability at the TFWA World Exhibition in Cannes. The company introduced new gifting products like the Kinder Mix Koala and Kinder Chocolate Pencil Case, and expanded its biscuit offerings with the launch of Kinderini. Ferrero also highlighted its commitment to sustainability with eco-designed packaging and reusable products.
green_innovation: TRUE, Ferrero's new products and packaging are designed to reduce waste and promote sustainability.
business_innovation: TRUE, Ferrero's new products, such as the Kinder Mix Koala and Kinder Chocolate Pencil Case, are innovative and differ significantly from the company's previous offerings.
green_product: TRUE, Ferrero's new products, such as the Kinder Mix Koala and Kinder Chocolate Pencil Case, are designed to be sustainable and reduce environmental impact.
green_process: TRUE, Ferrero's new packaging is eco-designed to be more sustainable and easier to recycle.

title: London-based circular economy startup Reboxed® secures €1.8 million to help tackle e-waste - EU-Startups
summary: Reboxed®, a sustainable tech startup, has secured €1.8 million in seed funding to help solve the e-waste crisis by rehoming 100 million electronic devices by 2030. The company provides out-of-the-box solutions for retailers and businesses to accelerate the move to a circular economy. Reboxed® has built a leading brand and recommerce platform connecting businesses and customers with a better and more sustainable way to buy and sell technology.
green_innovation: TRUE; Reboxed®'s recommerce platform helps businesses and consumers reduce e-waste and CO2 emissions by providing access to refurbished and pre-owned devices.
business_innovation: TRUE; Reboxed® offers a premium refurbished and pre-owned device service through a “like new” experience that focuses on quality, consistency and a genuinely circular approach.
green_product: TRUE; Reboxed®'s refurbished and pre-owned devices are a more sustainable option than buying new devices, as they reduce e-waste and CO2 emissions.
green_process: FALSE; The article does not describe a specific green process.
product_or_process: Recommerce platform for refurbished and pre-owned devices

title: Columbia Threadneedle upgrades two funds to article 9 - Delano.lu
summary: Columbia Threadneedle has reclassified eight funds as article 8 funds and two funds as article 9 funds under the EU's Sustainable Finance Disclosure Regulation (SFDR). This means that 84% of the assets under management in the Sicav are now classified as article 8 or article 9 financial products. This change reflects the firm's commitment to building on its responsible investment capabilities and adapting its product range to the new rules.

title: What is Bioeconomy and Why is it Important? - Ground Report
summary: The bioeconomy is an important part of the global economy and is becoming increasingly important as we move towards a more sustainable future. The bioeconomy has the potential to create millions of jobs, reduce our dependence on fossil fuels, and help us achieve the Sustainable Development Goals. The bioeconomy is crosscutting, encompassing multiple sectors, in whole or in part, including agriculture, textiles, chemicals, and energy.
green_innovation: TRUE, the bioeconomy promotes the use of renewable biological resources and reducing dependence on fossil fuels, which contributes to environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: FALSE, the article does not describe a specific product or process that meets the criteria to be a business innovation.
green_product: FALSE, the article does not describe a specific product that meets the criteria to be a green product.
green_process: FALSE, the article does not describe a specific process that meets the criteria to be a green process.
